doc.repnme: Privatization through broad-based ownership strategies : a more popular option ?
doc.abstracts: In some countries, privatization has stalled because of a popular perception that it benefits only the rich and powerful or only foreigners. The author looks at how governments can achieve more widespread public ownership and therefore boost political support for privatization. He focuses on voucher schemes, collective investment programs, and public offerings.
